param.name: download_cropland_data_layers
param.displayname: Download Cropland Data Layers? If yes, define years below. If no, define locally stored layers
param.dialogReference:
If yes, please define the years of rotation. If no, you must manually download and unzip all years of the Cropland Data Layer. This will take far more time then allowing the tool to download the data. If you choose to manually download each, you can do so here:

http://www.nass.usda.gov/research/Cropland/Release/index.htm

param.name: start_year
param.dialogReference: The algorithm used to identify generalized agricultural management schemes from crop rotations was created using the Cropland Data Layer for the years 2008-2012. These years are recommended, or at the least, we recommend using a 5-year rotation. We plan to test the algorithm for longer rotation durations, but have not yet implemented these methods.

param.name: end_year
param.dialogReference: The algorithm used to identify generalized agricultural management schemes from crop rotations was created using the Cropland Data Layer for the years 2008-2012. These years are recommended, or at the least, we recommend using a 5-year rotation. We plan to test the algorithm for longer rotation durations, but have not yet implemented these methods.

param.name: use_locally_stored_cropland_data_layers
param.displayname: Use locally stored Cropland Data Layers?
param.dialogReference:
If yes, please define the years of rotation. If no, you must manually download and unzip all years of the Cropland Data Layer. This will take far more time then allowing the tool to download the data. If you choose to manually download each, you can do so here:

http://www.nass.usda.gov/research/Cropland/Release/index.htm
